events.name: GDG DevFest Vietnam 2017

venue.name: HCMC University of Technology ( HUTECH University)
venue.address_1: 475 ƒêi·ªán Bi√™n Ph·ªß, Ph∆∞·ªùng 25, B√¨nh Th·∫°nh, H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh, Vietnam, Thanh Pho Ho Chi Minh

events.description:
‚Ä¢ DevFest events cover multiple product areas such as Android, Firebase, Google Cloud Platform, Machine Learning, and Mobile Web...

‚Ä¢ Technical topics will be selected based on the needs of Developer community. Moreover, DevFest 2017 is aim to enhance relevant soft skills for Developers to advance their career.

‚Ä¢ GDG DevFest 2017 is open for all IT communities, developers, experts, geeks, or students, who want to participate in this dev festival with us!

‚Ä¢ Register tickets: https://devfestvn2017.eventbrite.com/?aff=meetup (https://devfestvn2017.eventbrite.com)

‚Ä¢ For more info: www.devfest.vn

‚Ä¢ Contact: [masked] -[masked]

events.name: Google I/O Extended Vietnam 2018 in Ho Chi Minh City
events.description:
I/O Extended 2018 is coming back to Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam! We are working on interesting topics with amazing speakers. Please stay tuned!

Free Registration: http://goo.gl/SrrqfC

events.name: DevFest 2018 in Ho Chi Minh City
events.description:
DevFest 2018 is coming to Ho Chi Minh City.

This year is whole week event inspired by geek week theme. We are working on the agenda and update soon. Stay tuned!

events.description:
International Women's Day is back with the theme: Women Meet Code proudly organized by Google Developers Group Vietnam and Cat Can Code.

organizers.name: George N.
organizers.bio: George is an experience Senior Manager across different industries including IT, FMCG, Logistic & Education. He's currently Country Manager of 2359 Media, visiting lecturer of RMIT University & an entrepreneur who is opened for investment invitation.

organizers.name: Ngan
organizers.bio: Hi, I am Ngan learning how to be entrepreneur and write about local tech news in Vietnam on Twenty.vn. I love traveling and learning entrepreneurship from everyone around me.

group_profile.intro: I'm community builder in Vietnam, love tech startup & geeks world.
